body_html: Ok i have created a tutorial for them who want to build Tensorflow GPU1.5.0 for windows with cuda 9.1 and cudnn 7.0.5. Visit my blog for step by step instructions hope this will help lot of people and doesn't create an issue for build problems. Here is link of my blog http://www.python36.com/install-tensorflow-gpu-windows
